The images show a plan and an overview of the same architectural complex.
content.question: The plan shows processional routes and secondary structures that were primarily intended to

choices.label: facilitate priestly offerings of food and drink to the deceased
expedite the embalming process for the body of the deceased
mark the beginning and ending points for ritual circumambulation
aid large crowds of devotees during seasonal pilgrimages

content.answer: facilitate priestly offerings of food and drink to the deceased

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
